description: This file defines an ApiClient class that encapsulates HTTP client setup using the Dio package for network communication, including configuration and attaching an authentication interceptor.

classes.name: ApiClient
classes.description: A class that sets up and provides an HTTP client with predefined base URL and headers, and attaches an authentication interceptor.

methods.name: ApiClient
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the Dio client with specified base URL, timeouts, headers, and adds an authentication interceptor.
